projects.name: Happy Thoughts
projects.desc: A message app connected with API, created using React state management

projects.name: Portfolio
projects.desc: The portfolio you are currently looking at! Made through JSON, such as this text, and JavaScript and React to handle components and states. Monitored with a the testing framework Vitest

projects.name: Recipe library
projects.desc: Using Spoonacular's complex-search API to gather specific recipes, then using JavaScript to sort through different alternatives, independently and together. Inlcludes     pagination/infinite scrolling (well, until the api's daily limit)

projects.name: Weather app
projects.desc: A mob-programming project and weather application that enables the user to retrieve weather information from any city, inlucing general location-tracking, through OpenWeather's API

projects.name: Accessibility site
projects.desc: Another project done in mob-programming. The site has a rudementary design but follows different guidelines to allow accessibility for different disabilities or conditions

projects.name: First project
projects.desc: My first web project! A front-end project with an introduction to design, while utilizing a form with simple validation and site functions, like a dark-mode
